subject: Say "YES" to perfect sex!
body:
Going to have sex with two ladies at the same time? You need a strong erection, or they will have to satisfy each other. You really need Viagra!
Our shop
We have only high-quality national medications at low prices. There is no need for someone to know about your sexual problems. 
All this you can find here
Must have products.
With best regards,
Donald Allison
 
 
Poniatno. Nozh Bigmana polosnul tam, gde tolko chto byla moia grud. Priiatno imet delo s soobrazitelnymi liudmi, Celitel Udovletvorenno hmyknul. V moe vremia frajdeny neredkie Gosti-naemniki na planetah Federacii, kuda vhodit i moia Nova-2. 
Vzgliad u togo Byl otsutstvuiushchij. Hochesh znat, kak ia im Okazalsia? Ia prosto kupil etu dolzhnost. Okazatsia v dvuh shagah ot celi sviazannym po rukam i nogam. Zolotoe bylo vremechko takzhe i dlia ne priznannyh v svoem Krugu magov, sogreshivshih ili ushchemlennyh v svoih eksperimentah, kotorym Obshchepriniatye pravila byli chto nozh po gorlu, kupcov, ne udovletvorennyh Sostoianiem torgovyh del, da i prosto vsiakogo sbroda avantiuristov, liubitelej Prikliuchenij (zhit sredi legendarnyh nubesov eto zhe ogo-go!), banditov i Obychnyh melkih prestupnikov, kotoryh zakon eshche ne pojmal za ruku, no vot-vot Sobiralsia eto sdelat Svoboda, priznanie, udacha, bogatstvo eti slova mnogie Gody ne shodili s ust liudej, vnezapno obretshih vozmozhnost pereselitsia i Oshalevshih ot nezhdannogo schastia. Tolko pozovi menia pervym, kogda podojdet vremia. Vestnik tmy. Ne uspel ia spohvatitsia, kak on kinulsia na menia. Da kakoj ia teper posylnyj. 
Esli by ia ne spal. Mertvaia zona. I nam stoit podumat, Chto delat dalshe. Ponial, otvetil ia ne srazu, uzhe razdumyvaia nad poluchennoj informaciej. ejisuminyon XF5FVVtTW1Z0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
